description: The 10th generation iPad is an affordable Apple tablet with a 10.2-inch Retina display and support for the Apple Pencil. It's a versatile and budget-friendly option for various tasks and entertainment.
A refined design with fast performance.Samsung Galaxy A54 5G, complete with a high-resolution camera. View all your favorite shows, games in clear detail with the new fluid display.
The Google Pixel 5a is a mid-range smartphone known for its 6.34-inch OLED display and exceptional camera capabilities, running on a Qualcomm Snapdragon 765G processor.

The HUAWEI Band 6 is a fitness tracker with a large AMOLED display and features such as heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and multiple workout modes. It provides users with fitness and health-related data.
Experience uninterrupted creativity with a multi-device mouse that is crafted to create with programmable buttons, ergonomic design, and rechargeable battery life that lasts up to 3 months.

Omni-directional Party Sound with X-Balanced Speaker Unit, and five tweeters in front and rear.Handle/wheel for easy portability. TV Sound Booster provides a rich audio-visual experience with deep bass.
